channel.title: Reading parameters
channel.description: Back on my teensy connectivity plan. Is it possible to "get" parameters out over midi? My intention is to look at displaying them on a chat display which I'm sure the teensy could do if I can get the number out of midi of the last knob touched.

item.title: Reading parameters
item.dc:creator: @mongrol
item.description:
@mongrol wrote:

Back on my teensy connectivity plan. Is it possible to "get" parameters out over midi? My intention is to look at displaying them on a chat display which I'm sure the teensy could do if I can get the number out of midi of the last knob touched.
